title: Balancing Your Sexual Energy
itunes:title: Balancing Your Sexual Energy
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Emily is talking about sexual energy – and how it relates to your relationships in and out of the bedroom. She discusses how everyone has a masculine and a feminine energy, why having a balance of these energies is so important to...
description:
On today’s show, Emily is talking about sexual energy – and how it relates to your relationships in and out of the bedroom.

She discusses how everyone has a masculine and a feminine energy, why having a balance of these energies is so important to better bedroom experiences, and all the ways the masculine/feminine polarity relates to attraction, your relationship and your sex life.

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE: pjur, Magic Wand, SiriusXM, Good Vibrations, GAINSWave

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex advice, tips & tricks, visit sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
